## Bootstrapping

```{r bootFullMean}
set.seed(43)
samp_mean <- function(x, i) {
  mean(x[i])
}


GP <- na.omit(data$GP) 
results <- boot(GP, samp_mean, 100)
plot(results)
```

```{r}
boot.ci(results, type="perc")
```
```{r}
t.test(GP, mu = 4)
```

$$
t = \frac{\mu-\overline x}{SE}

```{r}
results$t0
```


```{r}
SE = sd(results$t)
c(results$t0-2*SE,results$t0+2*SE)
```

```{r}
t = (3.5-results$t0)/SE

1-pt(t,99)
```

```{r}
mean(3.5<=results$t)
```

```{r}
samp_min <- function(x, i) {
  min(x[i])
}

results2 <- boot(data$GP,samp_min, R = 10000)
plot(results2)
```

```{r}
xbar = mean(results2$t)
s = sd(results2$t)
c(xbar - 2*s,xbar + 2*s)
```

```{r}
boot.ci(results2, type = "perc")
```

```{r}
mean(0 == results2$t)
```
